name: ElectricSQL
title: electric-sql.com
shortDescription: ElectricSQL is a Postgres sync engine designed to handle the complexities of data synchronization, including partial replication and fan-out. It is ideal for developers looking to build fast, collaborative, and real-time applications without managing sync infrastructure. Example use cases include real-time dashboards, collaborative apps like Figma, and AI-driven platforms.
cons: Limited to HTTP and JSON interfaces
May require technical setup for scaling

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Supabase
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Similar to ElectricSQL with added features
